Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repetitive code using a loop
Improvements.Description: The method contains repetitive statements that can be refactored using a loop. This makes the code cleaner and easier to maintain.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
+ /**
+  * Packs the given long values into the specified byte array. The values are packed in a specific way,
+  * starting from the specified index.
+  *
+  * @param values the array of long values to pack
+  * @param i the start index in the values array
+  * @param buf the byte array to pack the values into
+  * @param off the start offset in the byte array
+  */
Improvements.Description: The method lacks documentation. Adding documentation helps others understand the purpose and usage of the method.
